solution_line_template: The total cost of breakfast is ${bagel_cost} + ${orange_juice_cost} = $<<{bagel_cost}+{orange_juice_cost}={total_breakfast_cost}>>{total_breakfast_cost}.
The total cost of lunch is ${sandwich_cost} + ${milk_cost} = $<<{sandwich_cost}+{milk_cost}={total_lunch_cost}>>{total_lunch_cost}.
Anna spent ${total_lunch_cost} - ${total_breakfast_cost} = ${difference_in_cost} more on lunch than breakfast.
